img_above_text:
### Black Myth: Wukong Buddha's Eyeball 3 Location
Head back to the Squall Hideout Shrine, and take the left path. Head through the gate and then up the hill.
img_below_text:
Once you reach the statue on your left, take a left and head towards the shaded area. The Buddha's Eyeball can be found here.
![Buddhas Eyeball 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/16/Buddhas_Eyeball_7.jpg)

img_summary: This image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character approaching a traditional Chinese-style gate in a rocky, overgrown environment. The gate leads to a shaded area mentioned in the context, where the Buddha's Eyeball collectible can be found. The preceding text suggests the player has navigated through the Squall Hideout Shrine and up a hill to reach this location, while the following text indicates the collectible is near a statue beyond the gate.
